definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: There are 34 undergraduate specialties and 23 laboratories for teaching in Hainan University.
sentences.chinese: 海南大學現有本科專業34個，教學實驗室23個。

sentences.english: I would like to teach English at Hainan University.
sentences.chinese: 願意到中國海南大學教學。

sentences.english: Excuse me. Could you tell me how to get to Hainan University?
sentences.chinese: 勞駕，請問去海南大學怎麼走？
